title: Angular 4.0.0 Now Available
body: We are very excited to share this release with the community, as it includes some major improvements and functionality that we have been working on for the past 3 months. We’ve worked hard to make sure that it’s easy for developers to update to this release.

title: Angular Material 2: Alpha preview!
body: On Tuesday, we released angular2-material alpha.0 - titanium-octopus, kicking off the public availability of the initial set of Angular Material 2 components.
